article.title: ZeroSearch
article.text: ZeroSearch is the first [[search engine]] for [[ZeroNet]] [[zite]]s. It uses naive queries to search through a plain-text index of [[zite]]s along with hand-picked tags. As of Sunday, 5th June, 2016 there are over 606 [[zite]]s listed in the index. ==See also== * [[Kaffiene]] * [[Kidsearch]] * [[bwoi]] * [[Zearch]] ==External links== * [http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit Official zite] [http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ZeroeuDnL2jNS6t1epQa1SPvC91KG8ER ðŸ“Ž] * [http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:2\19oqmmxwEN4mBrKAevRx5WiQKtkX8zGsbi/ZeroSearch on 0list] [http://127.0.0.1:43110/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o/?Topic:2\19oqmmxwEN4mBrKAevRx5WiQKtkX8zGsbi/ZeroSearch ðŸ“Ž]
